name: Cloud Chasers - Journey of Hope
description: In a dried up world, where death is your destiny, can you survive the struggle?
minimum_requirements: Mínimo: SO: Windows XP SP2+ Procesador: 2GHz Dual Core (SSE2 instruction set support) Memoria: 4 GB de RAM Gráficos: nVidia® 8800 GT / AMD® 4670 or faster Almacenamiento: 1 GB de espacio disponible
